definitions.definition: The view that absolute truth or ultimate certainty is unattainable, especially regarding knowledge not based on experience or perceivable phenomena .
The view that the existence of God or of all deities is unknown , unknowable , unproven , or unprovable .
Doubt , uncertainty , or scepticism regarding the existence of a god or gods.
Doubt , uncertainty , or scepticism regarding any subject of dispute.

main_definition: The view that absolute truth or ultimate certainty is unattainable, especially regarding knowledge not based on experience or perceivable phenomena .
secondary_definitions: The view that the existence of God or of all deities is unknown , unknowable , unproven , or unprovable .
Doubt , uncertainty , or scepticism regarding the existence of a god or gods.
( by extension ) Doubt , uncertainty , or scepticism regarding any subject of dispute.
